issue.title: parquet/low-level-api/reader-writer.cc has some typos.
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12176](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12176). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There are two typos:
1. In comment: \*memory consumption. -> \* memory consumption.
1. reader_writer.h and reader-writer.cc are not compatible, when you use vim to edit them, it's confuse why `:A` doesn't work.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12176?focusedCommentId=17315200) by yibocai#1 (yibocai#1):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9870
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9870>
